name: NEPENTHE
description:
Nepenthe refers to something that can make us forget pain and sorrow – a "drug of forgetfulness".

Problems and bad things will never really disappear from our daily life. You need to find something that can make you forget all your problems for a while. Whatever it is. Because you need to step away from your sorrow even if It's only for a while. Trust me, that "Nepenthe" will charge your energy to solve and face painful times.

3000x4000 px
500 dpi
104 unique doodle characters
